SELECT A.CODE_DETAIL_ID , A.CODE_MASTER_ID , A.CODE AS CODE_VALUE , A.CODE , A.MLG_CODE , A.USE_YN , A.DESCRIPTION , A.ATTR1 , A.ATTR2 , A.ATTR3 , A.ATTR4 , A.ATTR5 , A.SEQ
, B.MLG_KO AS CODE_NAME
, B.MLG_EN AS CODE_NAME
FROM CODE_DETAIL A LEFT JOIN COMM_MLG B ON A.MLG_CODE = B.MLG_CODE AND B.CODE_YN = '1' WHERE A.CODE_MASTER_ID = #{CODE_MASTER_ID} AND A.USE_YN = #{USE_YN} ORDER BY A.SEQ ASC
